snippet: The state has an unexpected $8.8 billion two years after it cut programs and services to meet a shortfall. But it is being held back by self-imposed caps.
lead_paragraph: The state has an unexpected $8.8 billion two years after it cut programs and services to meet a shortfall. But it is being held back by self-imposed caps.

headline.seo: Texas Has Plenty of Money, but Not to Spend
headline.main: Plenty of Money in State Coffers, but Not to Spend
headline.print_headline: Plenty of Money In State Coffers, But Not to Spend
